attributes.action: Reward Health Service Workers with a pay rise equal the real rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reward Health Service Workers with a pay rise equal the real rate of inflation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16452

Prime Minister's Office
